Mahira Khan Wiki | Height | Weight | Age | Husband | Affairs | Biography

Bolly Reporter
9 months ago

Mahira Khan is a Very Talented and Beautiful Pakistani Actress & Model. Furthermore, She appears in Pakistani films and Pakistani dramas. Also, She is one of Pakistan’s most popular and highest-paid actress. Mahira often regarded as Pakistan’s biggest superstar.

Biography & Wiki

Mahira Khan’s full name is Mahira Hafeez Khan and her Nickname is Mahira. She was born on 21 December 1984 in Karachi, Sindh, Pakistan. Therefore, her current age is 35 years. Mahira’s Zodiac is Sagittarius. She is currently resides in Karachi, Pakistan.

Family Members

Mahira’s father, Hafeez Khan, was born in Delhi during the British Raj and migrated to Pakistan after the partition of India. Her brother’s name is Hassan Khan who is a journalist.

MotherNot Available
BrotherHassan Khan (Younger)

Education and School, College

In her childhood, Mahira Khan attended the American School of Karachi, Pakistan and completed her O-Levels at the age of 16. Later on, She moved to California for higher education where she attended Santa Monica College. However, she is a college drop out and did not complete her undergraduate degree.

Boys, affairs, spouse name

Mahira married Ali Askari in a traditional Islamic wedding ceremony on 13 July 2007 with whom she met in 2006 in Los Angeles. Mahira Khan’s father was against this marriage. In addition, the couple has a son Azlaan Askari born on 15 September 2010. The couple got divorced in 2015.

There were rumors said Mahira dated Bollywood actor Ranbir Kapoor.

Mahira Khan filmography

Mahira Khan works in Lollywood Films and Pakistani Television Serials. She started her career as a VJ in 2006, hosting the live show Most Wanted on MTV Pakistan. She made her screen debut opposite Atif Aslam in the hit romance Bol (2011). This film was very successful and became one of the highest-grossing Pakistani movies of all time. After that, she played the lead role in Sarmad Khoosat’s Humsafar. In this movie, she pairs with co-star Fawad Khan. Their onscreen chemistry is loved by the audience very much and ‘Humsafar’ become the milestone for both of the actors.

She played the lead role for 2017 Film Raees directed by Rahul Dholakia., alongside Bollywood king Shahrukh Khan.

Awards and recognition

Mahira Khan has received many awards in her career in many categories like Best TV Actress, Best Actress, most stylish actress to awards for her beauty in shows like Lux Style Awards, HUM Awards, HUM Style Awards, Pakistan Media Awards, Vogue Beauty Awards and Masala Awards.

She received 1st Femina Middle East Women Awards in 2016. She also received special award for International Recognition and also Best Dress at the 8th Beirut International Awards Festival in 2017.

Salary and Net Worth

Mahira Khan charges 1 lac rupee per episode as salary. Her total net worth is $6 million.

Facts about Mahira Khan

  • Mahira has won Lux Style Awards and Hum Awards.
  • During her studies in the United States, she was a cashier clerk at a Rite Aid store in Los Angeles.
  • The drama sequential Woh Humsafar Tha was additionally aired on Zindagi (TV channel) and was fruitful in India. It earned her a Lux Style Award for Satellite Best TV Actress and a Hum Award for Best Onscreen Couple.
  • From 2013 to 2014, Mahira facilitated TUC The Lighter Side of Life, a syndicated program where she interviewed celebrities.
  • In December 2016, Mahira turned into a victim of false news after anti-India comment emerged ahead of the arrival of her Bollywood debut film Raees.
